item.title: How do u add stuff like commands
item.dc:creator: @xneonx xneonx
item.description:
@xneonx wrote:

To add a command, you will need to go to your source folder, find client.java and open it up. Then you will need to hit ctrl+f and search for something like “shops” Once you have done that, you should see something similar on your screen if(command.startsWith("shops") && playerRights >= 0){ triggerTele(2736, 3476, 0); } Now after you have that up, you can add your command you want by doing something like this if(command.startsWith("shops") && playerRights >= 0){ triggerTele(2736, 3476, 0); } if(command.startsWith("home") && playerRights >= 0){ triggerTele(x coord, y coord, height); } Hopefully I explained that good enough for you =P

Read full topic
